page.title: 10COEDELY KENNELS-TONYREFAIL
page.content: The kennels are situated just outside Coedely on top of a hill.The National Canine Defence League own the kennels but Mrs Roberts looks after the dogs with the help of another girl. The dogs have often been badly treated or abandoned.People bring in stray dogs they feed them and try to find homes for them. "Lucky" my dog was found in a plastic bag floating down the river.A man found him and took him to Mrs Roberts.They phoned my mother and told her to come up the kennels.When I came home from school I went to pick him up. They raise money by taking the dogs on sponsored walks or by selling Christmas cards. They sometimes have dog shows for the dogs with the waggiest tail or ones with the prettiest face.
